item.title: Build a Generative MIDI sequencer in Go
item.description: Introduction Generative music is always fun and engaging, so I decided to build a simple MIDI sequencer to mess around. In this project, the sequencer sends a random note within a given octave every quarter bar (4/4) Because it’s so simple, the code provided will be very easy to extend as you please. See Bonus Setup project $ mkdir gen_seq $ cd gen_seq $ go mod init Sequencer $ touch main.
